Stinkbomb:

::Stinkbomb, looking and acting perfectly normal, except for a twitch in his 
left 'brow' every five minutes, stepped into the bridge::
"Dang, I g...got creamed in that last battle...I need a new weapon." (he said 
aloud, searching through the pile, he pulled out a heavy laser rifle and 
cocked it, putting it into subspace, than took out an rapid fire laser pistol)
"There, ne...ne...next battle I won't be so easy to kick around." (he said, 
heading towards the engine room) "Let's see how much damage was done."
